Package imagingbook.pub.regions

Class BinaryRegionSegmentation.BinaryRegion

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.pub.regions.BinaryRegionSegmentation.BinaryRegion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<BinaryRegionSegmentation.BinaryRegion>, java.lang.Iterable<Pnt2d>
    Enclosing class:
    BinaryRegionSegmentation
    public class BinaryRegionSegmentation.BinaryRegion
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<BinaryRegionSegmentation.BinaryRegion>, java.lang.Iterable<Pnt2d>
    This class represents a connected component or binary region. It is implemented as an inner class to BinaryRegionSegmentation because it references common region labeling data. A BinaryRegionSegmentation.BinaryRegion instance does not have its own list or array of contained pixel coordinates but refers to the label array of the enclosing BinaryRegionSegmentation instance. Instances of this class support iteration over the contained pixel coordinates of type Pnt2d, e.g., by 
     import imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.Point;
 
 BinaryRegion R = ...;
 for (Point p : R) {
    // process point p ...
 }
    The advantage of providing iteration only is that it avoids the creation of (possibly large) arrays of pixel coordinates.
